plot: Ossie Davis narrates a history of "race films," films made before 1950 which catered to a primarily black audience.
title: Black Shadows on the Silver Screen
plot_es: Ossie Davis narrates a history of "race films," films made before 1950 which catered to a primarily black audience.
original_name: Black Shadows on the Silver Screen
plot_en: Ossie Davis narrates a history of "race films," films made before 1950 which catered to a primarily black audience.
